setup.agentFirstDesc: When enabled, automatically routes tasks to specialized agents
setup.agentFirstKeywords: based on keywords (e.g., "test" -> testing agent, "refactor" -> refactoring agent).
setup.agentFirstDefault: When disabled (default), you use the direct LLM and can invoke agents explicitly.
setup.enableAgentFirst: Enable agent-first mode (auto-route to specialized agents)?
setup.agentFirstEnabledInfo: Tasks will be automatically routed to specialized agents.
setup.agentFirstDisabledInfo: Use direct LLM. Invoke agents with --agent flag when needed.
setup.projectInitDesc: Project initialization analyzes your codebase and creates:
setup.projectInitBenefit: This helps the AI understand your codebase from the first message.
